description: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 22 July 2014 (RN: 14/04312) for use of the building as a single residential dwelling (Class C3) with associated internal and external alterations including erection of a sun room with terrace at roof level, partial infill of rear lightwell at basement level and car port enclosure; Namely, to excavate a sub-basement, alterations to roof extension and external alterations including removal of north and south roof windows and replacement of roof finishes.
